author: samwilsn
content: Thanks a ton for going through that PR!

author: voith
content:
I'm currently looking into things needed to get a functional EVM spec. 
One of the missing bits is Memory Management. 
I'm starting with this issue: https://github.com/quilt/eth1.0-specs/issues/10
Besides the memory cost calculator we need some utilities to manage memory. I'm planning to build those in subsequent PRs. 
Any objections?
